dict.acceptation: 电力；电流，静电；高涨的情绪；紧张；

sent.orig: Weekly report the consumption of electricity. Apply for electricity rate. Attend the meeting of electricity management.
sent.trans: 填报用电周报、电量申请、参加供电电量平衡调度会。

sent.orig: Shanghai Electricity Meter Works bought former Shanghai No.5 Electricity Meter Works.
sent.trans: 1998年上海电度表厂收购前上海第五电表厂。

sent.orig: Reduces electricity costs having to change electricity consumption habits or appliances.
sent.trans: 无需改变用电习惯或更换电器就能降低用电成本。

sent.orig: In addition, by increasing the self-produced electricity, direct supply ratio, in order to reduce electricity costs.
sent.trans: 此外，又通过增加自产电、直供电比率，以降低电费支出。

sent.orig: Electricity: the deployment of a unified power grid to guarantee the demand for electricity.
sent.trans: 用电：电网统一调配，保障用电需求。
